name: hikky.
description:
A blackout has shut down your computer - your life.

Being a shut in, having no internet nor electricity basically equals death... But you can't die now. You need them. You still have to continue your online life.

Blinded by desperation, you stepped outside your room...

However, what is this world you're seeing? Have you locked yourself in for so long you forget how the offline world looks like?

What is that thing? Why is it moving? Why is it looking at you?

You start sensing danger all around you. Your anxiety strangles you tighter and tighter with each step you take. It's hard to see anything in the dark, but...

W h y   i s   e v e r y t h i n g   l o o k i n g   a t   y o u ?

#BinusGAT
